name: Gladiator Beast Retiari
effectText: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster: You can target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish it. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled: You can shuffle it into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Retiari".
